emailConfirmation.title: Email Confirmation
emailConfirmation.description: Type the OTP you received on your e-mail to continue confirm your email

LanguageSelection.title: Language Selection
LanguageSelection.description: Please, choose your preferred language that you want to be set on the application, it can also be changed anytime.

OnBoarding.title: Etlas
OnBoarding.description: Is an augmented reality application that helps people to recognize monuments during their tour in anywhere in  the world by only a scan using your mobile camera.
OnBoarding.worrytext: No worries, your tour guide is here ;)

Register.title: Register
Register.description: Please, fill your information up carefully.
Register.passwordhint: Password must be at least 8 characters and must contain letters and symbols.

AboutUs.description: We are a Computer Science students that graduated from faculty of computers and informatics Suez Canal university who wanted to make an E-Tourism application to make tourism more easy and also much fun to try and experience.

KnowledgeCheck.title: Knowledge Check
KnowledgeCheck.StatuesText: Test yourself in the most popular statues.
KnowledgeCheck.MonumentsText: The world of monuments is in your mind, time to test.
KnowledgeCheck.LandmarksText: of course you know alot of landmarks, let's try.

Home.title: Home

forgotPassword.title: Forgot Password
forgotPassword.descriptionFirst: Enter your E-mail to send a mail to re-assign a new password for your account.
forgotPassword.descriptionSecond: Type the OTP you received on your e-mail to continue reseting your password.
forgotPassword.description: Enter your old password and make new password
